name: Template

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The template has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

reactions.name: Riposte
reactions.desc: When a creature misses the template with a melee attack, the template can make a melee weapon attack against that creature.

legendary.name: Chop
legendary.desc: The template takes the Scimitar action.

description: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog.

lairactions.description: While in its lair, the creature can invoke dangerous effects.
bullets: The creature causes poisonous gas to seep into the lair. Each hostile creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or take 14 (4d6) poison damage.
The creature summons Quasits that fight until the start of its next turn.
The lair trembles violently; each creature on the ground must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

regionaleffects.description: The region containing a template’s lair is warped by the creature’s presence, which creates one or more of the following effects:
bullets: Underground surfaces within 1 mile of the template’s lair are slimy and wet and are difficult terrain.
Water sources within 1 mile of the lair are supernaturally fouled. Enemies of the template that drink such water vomit it within minutes.
regionaleffects.secondaryDescription: If the template dies, the effects fade over the course of 3d10 days.
